entry.source: {F812}Male demonoid\0{F87A,103}{F813,1,415101}Oh, hello, my lovely Intruders. Wha--{F801}Do you mean ME!?{F801}{F802}Come now! You've met me before! I'm the{F801}demonoid from Akira's place.{F801}{F802}Well, no offense taken. Demonoids do{F801}look similar to one another.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Male demonoid\0{F87A,103}{F813,1,415100}Oh, hello, my lovely Intruders. Akira{F801}already told me the whole story.{F801}{F802}You whacked Kenji, right? No kidding!?{F801}Then Akira's the new King of Tokyo...{F801}{F802}Hurrah for the birth of King Akira...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Male neurisher\0{F87A,148}{F813,1,417003}Around the time Kenji, who'd just become{F801}a demonoid, defeated the demon in{F801}Ichigaya and became King of Tokyo...{F801}{F802}He declared that all residents of Tokyo{F801}must choose to become either neurishers{F801}or demonoids.{F801}{F802}Kenji's men took all the normal humans{F801}left in Tokyo to Ichigaya...{F801}{F802}There, we were forced to undergo{F801}surgery. Of course, he let us choose{F801}which operation we wanted...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Female demonoid\0{F87A,104}{F813,1,417102}This really is Shinjuku, isn't it!? It's{F801}like I'm in a dream! The underground{F801}mall looks like a huge garden...!{F801}{F802}The old Shinjuku occupants were so{F801}short-sighted. Our boss chose right!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Female demonoid\0{F87A,104}{F813,1,417102}This really is Ichigaya, isn't it!? It's{F801}like I'm in a dream! Though the shopping{F801}isn't very good here...{F801}{F802}But the defenses are top-notch! It'll{F801}make a great fort for us. Our boss{F801}chose right!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,85}{F813,1,401701}Oh, my dear masters! I thought you had{F801}all gone back to your own world!{F801}{F802}I'm going to Ichigaya.
